name: asciidoctor-code-samples
description: Asciidoctor tabbed code samples js extension for API docs

scripts.dist: npm run clean && npm run dist:node
scripts.dist:node: mkdir -p dist/node && cp src/**.js dist/node/ && cp -r src/resources dist/node/
